Uremis et al. synthesised BTA derivatives using substituted aldehyde with bicyclo[3.2.0]hept-2-en-6-one. The nitro-styryl containing benzothiazole derivative 57 and the fluorostyryl benzothiazole derivative 58 ( Figure 35) were reported for their anticancer activity against pancreatic cancer cells having IC 50 values of 27 ± 0.24 µM for 57 and of 35 ± 0.51 µM for derivative 58
58 .
